# [Interview #1182: Harold Washington Library Center-AU Tour, Entry #65](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1182#65)

#### Argent

Can a Shard choose to just instantly invest in a place?

#### Brandon Sanderson

They can just start making some stuff, yeah.
